mapper.select: SELECT t_find.information, t_find.releasetime, t_user.userName, t_user.nickname, t_user.login_phone, t_show.show_name, t_show.show_place, t_show.show_status FROM t_find INNER JOIN t_user ON t_find.user_id = t_user.id INNER JOIN t_show ON t_find.show_id = t_show.show_id WHERE user_id=#{user_id}
